s:male retired aged 73 years presents with progressive severe burning substernal pain which is worst when lying down at night and sometimes associated with a sour taste, severe regurgitation, hoarseness and Stomach for past 2 days. he denies smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 176 cm, Weight 82.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Neuro = alert and oriented x 3, CN 2-12 intact a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Laparoscopic Nissen Fudoplication - Fundoplication of the stomach and gastroesophageal junction.
